That's great to hear! Brushing Luna regularly is an excellent way to prevent hairballs and reduce shedding. It's also a wonderful way to bond with her and provide some quality attention.

Regular brushing can help:

* Reduce shedding and prevent hairballs
* Distribute skin oils, promoting healthy skin and coat
* Remove tangles and mats, reducing the risk of skin irritation
* Strengthen the bond between you and Luna, as she associates brushing with positive attention

It's wonderful that Luna enjoys the brushing sessions! Many cats love the gentle touch and attention, and it can be a calming experience for them.

When choosing a scratching post, you can also look for reviews that mention the product's ease of cleaning and maintenance. A scratching post with a removable cover or easy-to-clean surface can make a big difference in keeping your home clean and reducing odors.

Additionally, consider the warranty or return policy of the product. A good manufacturer should stand behind their product and offer a reasonable warranty or return policy in case you're not satisfied.

Remember, every cat is different, so it might take some trial and error to find the perfect scratching post for Luna. But with patience and persistence, you'll find the right one that meets her needs and preferences.

Keep up the great work with Luna's grooming, and I'm sure she'll continue to thrive under your care!
